app_code.description: Tenant's application code (eg. sumo, ads, remote-settings). This is automatically populated by Argo CD.

artifact_id.description: The 8 character short revision of the Helm chart deployed by Argo CD. This is automatically populated by Argo CD.

chart.description: The name of the chart. This will match the app_code in single chart applications. This is automatically populated by Argo CD.

env_code.description: Environment (ie. dev, stage, prod). This is automatically populated by Argo CD.

image.description: The container image repository and tag. This can be managed by Argo Image Updater.

project_id.description: GCP project ID. This is automatically populated by Argo CD.

realm.description: A high-level grouping of infrastructure environments that share common networking and management boundaries (ie. nonprod, prod). This is automatically populated by Argo CD.
